Cameron Platter (amụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na South Africa.

A kọwawo ọrụ ya dị ka "ihe na-adịghị mma", "nwa ịhụnanya nke Quentin Tarantino na Dr Seuss" na ebe "ihe dị ịtụnanya nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị na-agbakọta ọnụ n'okwu na-enweghị ihere na-enweghị mgbaghara, ma na-edebe ihe n'ụzọ miri emi".

A na-enwe ihe atụ na nchịkọta nke Museum of Modern Art na New York; FRAC des Pays de la Loire na France; Iziko South African National Gallery; Margulies Collection na Miami, Florida; Zeitz Collection na South Africa; nakwa New Church Collection na South Afrika.
